title: Third Floor Apartment for Rent
posting_body: ['Large vintage 1BR/1BA apartment with lovely finishes.', 'Very spacious and ample storage.', 'Kitchen with dishwasher opens to dining/rec/office area.', 'Large living room with fireplace and built ins.', 'Ceiling fans, windows and hardwood floors add to the airy space.', 'Double sink bathroom.', 'Walk to lake, bus and el.', 'Landscaped, enclosed yard with laundry and storage in basement.', 'Rent includes ALL utilities (except cable/internet/telephone).', '$55.00 per person application fee.', '$500.00 fee due at signing.', 'No Security deposit.', 'Cats are allowed for an additional $20.00 per month per cat and must be declawed and spayed/neutered.', 'No Dogs!', 'Rent is $1,425.00 per month and unit is available July 1st.']
